channel.title: Sarajevo Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sarajevo Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Stellan Skarsgard to Receive Honorary Heart of Sarajevo at Sarajevo Film Fest
item.description: “The Sarajevo Film Festival remains unwavering and driven in its aim to highlight subjects of great consequence, underscored by an intense lust for life. I love going there.”

item.title: Stellan Skarsgard to Receive Honorary Heart of Sarajevo at Sarajevo Film Fest
item.description: “The Sarajevo Film Festival remains unwavering and driven in its aim to highlight subjects of great consequence, underscored by an intense lust for life. I love going there.”

item.title: Sarajevo Film Festival Unveils Lineup Exploring Life and Survival in “Unstable Social Frameworks”
item.description: The four competition sections of the 31st edition of the fest in Bosnia and Herzegovina will feature 15 world, six international, 28 regional, and two national premieres.

item.title: Sarajevo Film Festival Unveils Lineup Exploring Life and Survival in “Unstable Social Frameworks”
item.description: The four competition sections of the 31st edition of the fest in Bosnia and Herzegovina will feature 15 world, six international, 28 regional, and two national premieres.

item.title: Sergei Loznitsa to Head Jury at 31st Sarajevo Film Festival
item.description: Ukrainian director-writer Sergei Loznitsa will be president of the main jury of the 31st Sarajevo Film Festival, it was revealed Friday. He’ll be joined by Serbian actor Dragan Mićanović, Romanian dir

item.title: Sarajevo Film Festival Names Ukraine Director Sergei Loznitsa Jury President
item.description: Joining him as jury members are Dragan Mićanović, Emanuel Pârvu, Ena Sendijarević, and Tricia Tuttle.
